textTemplates.name: h_1b8188e2d976396923e4f37aa810bacc_Pharos_Template
textTemplates.text:
An Error Occurred with Your "DY Screen + Rollback" Flow

You've received this email because an error occurred while your "DY Screen + Rollback" flow was running. Debug this flow in Flow Builder.

Error element debug (FlowActionCall).
Debug: end


Open Flow


Flow Error Details

Flow Details

Flow API Name: testnewmp__DY_Screen_Rollback_Transform
Type: Flow
Version: 6
Status: Active
Org: {!$Organization.Id} ({!$Organization.Name})


Flow Interview Details

Interview Label: DY Screen + Rollback
Interview GUID: {!$Flow.InterviewGuid}
Current User: {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}
Start time: {!$Flow.InterviewStartTime}
Duration: 0


How the Interview Started
{!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName} ({!$User.Id}) started the flow interview.
API Version for Running the Flow: 63.0

textTemplates.text:
DECISION: Do the records exist?
Skipped this outcome because its conditions weren't met: All_records
Outcome conditions:
\{!Get_Account} ({!Get_Account}) IsNull true
\{!Get_Contact} ({!Get_Contact}) IsNull true
\{!Get_Opps} ({!Get_Opps}) IsNull true
All conditions must be true (and)

Skipped this outcome because its conditions weren't met: Account
Outcome conditions:
\{!Get_Account} ({!Get_Account}) IsNull true
\{!Get_Contact} ({!Get_Contact}) IsNull false
\{!Get_Opps} ({!Get_Opps}) IsNull false
All conditions must be true (and)

Outcome conditions:
\{!Get_Contact} ({!Get_Contact}) IsNull true
\{!Get_Account} ({!Get_Account}) IsNull false
\{!Get_Opps} ({!Get_Opps}) IsNull false
All conditions must be true (and)

Skipped this outcome because its conditions weren't met: Opportunity
Outcome conditions:
\{!Get_Opps} ({!Get_Opps}) IsNull true
\{!Get_Account} ({!Get_Account}) IsNull false
\{!Get_Contact} ({!Get_Contact}) IsNull false
All conditions must be true (and)

Default outcome executed.
